website_summaries.verdict: Solid all around double din Bluetooth solution that also allows DVD/CD playback. Features navigation and rear camera integration.
pros: Multiple input including USB, SD and auxiliary-in
cons: Screen needs to be manually dimmed at night

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after seeing a flood of negative reviews on this product claiming all sorts of weird things about the volume control and various other problems. I experienced none of these. I purchased the version with hi red audio, bluetooth, and navigation. Maybe they got a different one. For under 200 this radio has been amazing. Everything works fine. USB, bluetooth, CD, DVDs play great and look great. The features are very nice . The GPS is alright. Needs more options on customizing routes a. Overall it has been worth every penny. Not a single thing these bad reviews are saying happened to me. Just make sure you install it right and have some good speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely blank screen in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT expect much from a head unit that cost less than $100, but I did expect to get at least more than 3 months out of the unit. The bluetooth echo made the unit nearly impossible to use for hands free communication and then the whole unit went blank and would not turn on. Not my first install on a head unit so I troubleshooted to make sure it wasn't a fuse and that the unit was getting power from the harness, and it is. Something internally is not working. Great features and design for the cost of this unit, but sadly the quality is not there with this one to justify the cost...
customer_reviews.author: A.Texas.Yankee

customer_reviews.title: touch screen touch sensor non functional out of box, ...
customer_reviews.text: touch screen touch sensor non functional out of box, tried to calibrate it by instruction book, instructions require using touch controls to calibrate the non responsive and non functioning touch controls..... remote does not offer access to most functions in menus either and there is no option to run this touch screen free... so now i have no way to set up speaker calibration propperly... thanks boss, yall made a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Knight

customer_reviews.title: Complete Junk
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the biggest pile of garbage I have ever purchased. Bought it for Chritmas for my wife, installed it on New Years day. It freezes all the time. Driving down the road and all of a sudden, the stereo freezes, can't control the volume, the station, the mode, nothing. The touch controls are finicky. You have to touch them 3 or 4 times before your input is registered. Do yourself a favor and purchase something else. Even the Wal-Mart brand is better than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Horrible reliability. Died 1 day after warranty expiration
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the BVB9364RC on 3/8/16 and today 3/9/17 the unit stopped working. Exactly 1 day over the 1 year warranty provided by BOSS. 1. Touch screen went black but backlight is still on. 2. Buttons and dials are not responsive. 3. No radio, no backup camera, and won't even eject CD. 4. Power does not turn off unless unplugged, even if the car is turned off. 5. Neither the reset button or power cycling (via unplugging) brings back the unit. 6. After unplugging and re-plug in power the unit goes back to vegetable state. So it's now a paper weight. Still trying to figure out how to get my CD out. Would not recommend because of the reliability issue.
customer_reviews.author: Zabos

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointment. I wasn't expecting much for the price but, less than 9 months and it's stopped working twice. Totally blank screen...unresponsive. Removed it once, checked everything. It started working again but, quit again recently. Not playing around. Spent the money and ordered a Pioneer. Should have invested in that from the jump. The unit is ok for the price. Don't expect too much. The touch screen is garbage unless you use the stylus all the time. The gps is adequate at best. The dvd seemed pretty good with the volume all the way up. I was trying to get a decent navigation system and not spend a ton of money. I got what i paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick-

customer_reviews.title: installed into a 2001 toyota tacoma with no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Probably took 2.5 Hours total to install. The one thing I had a slight issue with is that they tell you to use their brackets and their brackets will not work for the Toyota install. Use the brackets on the original Toyota stereo and mount the brackets in the most forward threaded holes on the sides of new stereo. This will place the front of the stereo in the proper position within the dash board.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: If you like worthless then this audio system is for you.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The volume is out of control on my stereo. One click on the dual and it blasted away. I can not get a steady radio frequency. Always fades in and out. A cudos to the CD player. If it wasn't for that I would have ripped it out and thrown it out the window. I haven't hooked up the camera so nothing to say about that. Bluetooth worked fine for me with no issues. Looking to replace this double din with something better. Don't think it will be with a Boss thoughi
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. Just installed yesterday. Initial impression is a 5 ... sound is good..a touch better then the stock one it replaced... Install was straight forward... Bluetooth works good (my main usage).. Touch screen is responsive and UI is good. Still need to put an sd in it, but so far I like it
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: buy a interface kit, wel worth it
customer_reviews.text: very good product. I installed a wireless camera too. wired the reverse wire to fuse #4, and grounded the parking brake wire. Rest of wires were all color coded and matched. Wired back camera to lisence plate lights. I got a interface for wiring harness at wallmart, My wife loves it. phone, camera, gps, dvd/video, radio.. if you ground the parking brake wire, you bypass video lock out, so can watch while driving(and run video to rear monitors too). Phone works really well... DAT 66 years old, if I can do it, so can you..
customer_reviews.author: Duane T.

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit 2004 F250 without cutting dash!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2004 F250. This was NOT a simple head unit swap. I had to cut and trim a significant amount of the dash to get the unit to fit. I got this unit mainly for the price and to install a backup camera. The camera installed fine, but the video signal switches to the camera like it is supposed to, but the video is blank. To work around this, I installed a small switch on the dash. When I put the truck in reverse, I have to flip the switch to reset the video feed. An extra step, but works every time now.
customer_reviews.author: WillPorter

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price.  No hesitation about buying again.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install if you read the instructions and plan ahead first. This unit has very good sound and video quality. The touch screen functions well and is easy to see. I placed the gps antenna inside on the dash, centered and close to the windshield. I have no problems with reception. Easily update an old vehicle for a lot less than an auto dealer.
customer_reviews.author: PnT Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works
customer_reviews.text: It worked for 10 months just fine, then screen went blank and won't respond at all. Looks cool when it works, but is a piece of junk now. Since it was purchased through Amazon.com it comes with a 3 year warranty, so I'm sending it back to be repaired. Pros: Back up camera works pretty well with large display. Lots of options for playing music and such. Impresses passengers with how it looks. Inexpensive. Comes with 3 year warranty. Cons: Hard to press touch screen buttons sometimes. Of course it died in 10 month's time, so that's a huge negative.
customer_reviews.author: kodiakcowboy

customer_reviews.title: Radio does not pick up stations very well
customer_reviews.text: This unit sounds great and has a lot of features of more expensive ones. Unfortunately the tuner is crap and it won't auto switch to the reverse camera. I had to buy an antenna booster which only helps a little. The back up camera is wired correctly, one end to the back up lights and the other end to the reverse switch and the setting is enabled. I still have to go through the menu to see in reverse. All in all I give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works well as a music playing device. The GPS can be problematic. You can't just enter the address you want to go to. You have to enter country, state, town, street and then number. Sometimes after all that you'll get "address not found" message. Especially when you enter the address into another device and it is found without a problem. Maybe there is an update for this unit, but it does not prompt you to do it like my old Garmin would.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: honest review...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2003 honda odyssey VIP build and been running it for 7-8 months now. Great product for the price. Pros: great price, picture quality is excellent, video is awesome, easy installation. Cons: touch screen can be finicky at times, volume has a dramatic jump in some levels, if it's too hot in your car the system will not turn on. All in all pretty happy with the buy. U do get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: krazy447

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for would change it so you don't have to push mode button 50 times to switch to main screen Bluetooth for phone calls sucks boss says have to reset it did that it works for couple days then have to reset again call them back said they have no idea what is wrong with it might have to send in for warranty repair they told me this is less then week old
customer_reviews.author: Jtd4955

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.
customer_reviews.text: Love the unit. Had to take time to figure out how to hook up the factory amps though. Factory speakers are 8 ohms wired up in parallel. Only wish that when using the usb for my music I could figure out a way to skip over a folder to the next one without going through each track. 132 folders. Am able to with the head unit in my truck. Backup display is nice. Haven't tried the cd/dvd function yet. Will eventuallyy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe s.

customer_reviews.title: Compatibility Issues
customer_reviews.text: While this audio receiver has many options and is, thus, a good value, it isn't fully compatibly with my vehicle, per the installers. Although using the appropriate wiring harnesses, the installer were unable to get all of the steering wheel controls to work and were unable to get this to sync with our rear dvd screen. Aside from this, I do like the bluetooth feature, back up camera feature, and the ability to make phone calls (through bluetooth). For a car with fewer options than ours, this may be perfect for you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good head unit bad Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this is pretty awesome for what you pay for The downsides are the Bluetooth radio people will constantly tell you you sound like you're underwater or in a tin can. The backup camera has a decent size pigtail on it but if you have a full size truck you're going to need some kind of extension. It just won't reach the back of the vehicle. I haven't found a fix for the Bluetooth problem which is a bit of a disappointment my thought is to try a different microphone than what it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost, it's cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Day 1, literally just finished installing so I will update if I come across any issues. It has every modern feature you could want, including the option to add a backup camera and wire it in. Bluetooth connection was simple. Has an equalizer, so that's a plus for sure. 10/10 from me, so far so good Update- 1 week in and the stereo wouldn't turn on at all. Unplugged the harness and plugged it back in, it started working. Touch screen works when it wants to, and it causes songs to skip when streaming via bluetooth.. return process started this morning, we'll see how the customer service is I guess.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo, when it worked !
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stereo. The reviews were mixed, but the good seemed to outweigh the bad. It worked fine for a few days, but then it started freezing and I would have to reset it. After about the 5th time in 2 weeks I decided to return it. I probably just got a bad one, but I decided to go with a better radio instead. I actually liked this Boss stereo when it worked !
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I had this system professionally installed due to some of the issues that I saw other people having after installing it themselves. In the past, I purchased an 800 dollar Clarion unit for my 2004 Hyundai Elantra. I purchased this Boss unit for my 1995 Ford Ranger. Bluetooth works very well with my LG G5 phone. The map is easy to see as long as you use a good color scheme (one of the schemes has such a light background that it's difficult to see the road son the map). I haven't had any problem with this unit since installing it and I think that this is a good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Daytime video is questionable
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my "old" car radio (after 10 years of Florida sunshine) after it failed and chose this one as the best available option for me. I am still exploring its capabilities and I am finding it quite an improvement over the factory radio for my car (2009 vintage). What has bothered me, though is that during daylight hours, the screen is almost unreadable. Part of the problem, I admit, is that the radio is near the top of the center console. I don't miss Sirius XM that I never activated but I do miss my steering wheel controls. I will probably be purchasing and installing that feature in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the rear to install but like the features.
customer_reviews.text: Seems louder than factory, better sound. Was a pain to get in 03 F250 but it's done. Adaptors bought didn't help the install much. Backup camera works again. I like the security blanket of being able to see behind truck again. Bluetooth will spare me having to listen to radio dj's babbling incessantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Horton

customer_reviews.title: was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase. The wiring was straight forward with the rear view camera as an exception. I wired the "hot" wire to my blinker as the turn on switch for the camera and voila, worked like a charm. Make sure to wire first before you push the camera into the car body so that you can adjust the position(mine was upside down on the screen. I had to pop out and readjust. Easier to wire then pop into place with another person.) the system is good for the price and im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Arias

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Seemed well built. Great many features for the price. Unfortunately I cannot comment on its workmanship. The installer would only install radios he sold. Ended up returning to buy a different one in store . I paid more for less features. Wish I could have tried this one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Latuff

customer_reviews.title: Mechanics are poor!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! Bought this same radio twice for my boyfriend thinking it was the fault of the US Mailbox company that damaged it first but the isssue was from the manufacturer later concluded by the installer. The mechanics of the screen isn't good, after the first week of installation, the screen has a permanent large static look in the background, it sometimes blanks out and it dims while in use which makes it difficult to see while driving where you need focus and that's permanent. If you buy this, you will be disappointed, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka H.

customer_reviews.title: Price isn't bad for a touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Price isn't bad for a touch screen. Fits my '01 Accord. It glitches every now and then so I have to reset it.. It's also kind of laggy. I might have to change it out in the future since it really doesn't meet my standards. And also because it'll function when it wants too. Sometimes I'll have to use my other Bluetooth which plays over the radio. Other than that, it's okay. Haven't used the DVD since I didn't set up. It beats having the stock cassette tape player radio deck I had in before though.
customer_reviews.author: cookiemkr

customer_reviews.title: Installed 2006 Chevy Equinox w/o ONSTAR & Steering Controls.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this for my daughters 2006 Chevy Equinox. Used the Metra 95-3302 double-din install kit/40GM10 Ant harness, and a RadioPro3 (PAC) wiring harness(used the stock amp). She likes all the features, mainly bluetooth. I liked using the wiring harness made from PAC was for without ONSTAR, but also has a port for steering control harness which we didn't have on the Equinox. You can also save some $$ using the RP3 harness than the GMOS-08 interface harness.
customer_reviews.author: ICCS(SW)

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE RADIO, MET ALL MY EXPECTATIONS! LOTS OF GREAT FEATURES. MY ONLY PROBLEM WAS THAT I FIND, JUST BEING A DIY GUY, THE WIRING INSTRUCTIONS LEFT A LITTLE TO BE DESIRED. BUT WITH SOME TRIAL AND ERROR, I GOT IT FIGURED OUT. THE INSTALL IS IN A 2002 JEEP WRANGLER TJ USING A 'META' AFTERMARKET CENTER CONSOLE TO HANDLE THE DOUBLE DIN RADIO. THE REPLACEMENT CONSOLE IS ALSO AVAILABLE FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN RINI

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Everything works as it should. Once the Bluetooth was connected, you can sync your contacts to the radio so you know who's calling. Navigation works quite well. I had to adjust the settings to get the map view I wanted, but it works as it should. Installing in my 02 Yukon Denali was a bit of a hassle. Had to "trim" the dash to get it to fit, but it wasn't terrible. Also needed to buy an adapter for the antenna. Overall I'm pleased, but I've only had it installed one day. If anything goes awry, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't get your hopes up
customer_reviews.text: This device functions....barely. The audio sounds horrible, the microphone on the BT phone is really bad. The volume control goes from very low to way too loud in one click. There is no way to scan radio stations that I have found. The best part is that I can stream music from my phone through the car stereo seamlessly, although I get no data about what is being played through the screen (artist, title, album art, etc.) and the quality of the audio is pretty bad, but I've kind of gotten used to it. The price was right, but I would definitely not recommend this unit at any price.
customer_reviews.author: AH64DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a very good unit. Gps loads a little slow but it prompts you early and has lane assist.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: I like the sound quality now
customer_reviews.text: I have installed it in my 2005 Toyota Sienna minivan for more than 2 months, and I installed BOSS BASS800 under seat subwoofer. I also installed the rear view camera and the steering wheel control kit. They work greatly together. I like the sound quality now, so much better than my original Toyota cassette/cd radio. The Bluetooth and microphone work very well for the handsfree phone call. I tested all the features, such as DVD movie player, CD, MP3, USB memory stick, mini SD, AUX in, Bluetooth music. They all work fine. I installed everything by myself. It is not super difficult but needs some handyman's skill.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it, just don't.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, the volume between 6 and 7 is insane. 6 is quiet, and 7 is way to loud. The volume difference between the CD and Radio is scary. Plus, when I switch to the screen that allows you to adjust detailed volume control, I get a totally different sound without touching anything! The display is way to bright at night, even on the lowest setting. Plus the radio quality is intermittent. I sent it back. I just installed a cheaper unit (w/o DVD) I purchased at my local auto parts store, and it's works like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for the price, touch screen is a little off and doesnt always respond when touched, any glare of sun and you won't be able to see the screen. Bluetooth is crackly. Stereo just went out on me after 2 months and I'm really bummed about it. It makes me not want to own anymore boss audio products. update: sent in for repairs, BOSS said stereo worked fine sent it back and it works for now in my car. I have no idea what has happened i havent changed anything in my car since removing the stereo now i get the stereo back and its working so im happy about that. unsure if the problem will occur again.
customer_reviews.author: jeff johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get a wire harness for your vehicle first.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Sounds great, really easy to use. I installed it myself in a 2003 Subaru Outback. Do yourself a favor and get the wire harness for your car, then splice the wires ahead of time. I did that, and once I had the dash trim out, it was plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Truelock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Idk what everyone else is bit€1ng about. Installed in no time works flawlessly. 2000 econoline. Had to shave the dash as no dual din fits properly, but once installed is AMAZING for the price. If you're mechanically inclined this is perfect for what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is so great... Bought another brand earlier this year , thinking we alwere getting a deal... Not so much... Love this stereo it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Will & Ace

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The BOSS BV9364B is budget radio that add Bluetooth and dvd player. The Good: Great price Bluetooth Can add a backup camera The Bad: RCA Jacks are flush with the back of the radio. This is my biggest complaint. I installed this in my 2002 4-Runner but with the RCA jacks plugged in I couldn't flush mount the radio. It was too deep. So I returned it. The radio is not good. Very poor reception. I ended up returning this unit and bought the Pioneer AVH-X2600BT. It was more money but it fits great and the radio reception is a little better.
customer_reviews.author: dangerboy

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This radio is junk!! I’m highly displeased! I spend $189 on a radio I expect it to work longer then two weeks, was professionally installed, that was $135, and in under two weeks the blue tooth has stopped working, dose not recognize my usb or aux, the radio goes in and out, I thought on the positive side the gps worked, then just started freeze framing soon as it comes on. So after the money spent I just have a light up screen in my dash that looks nice. Tried getting support on boss audio.com and don’t get nothing back! Do not buy this radio!! Please spend the extra money to buy quality!
customer_reviews.author: Allen g.

customer_reviews.title: Just save for a better one
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a 2 din raido and had zero money so I got this knowing how bad some of their stuff is, it lasted about a year and now in having problems were the screen will just die or the unit will freeze but continue to play music, I'd give it a lower score but it worked very well while I used it, it pushed 4 kicker 5.25 door speakers and sent a clean signal to my 800 watt kicker sub
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great radio and great price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the factory radio in my 2003 F 150 Ford and it is a great upgrade. I am very Happy with this radio. The only problem is it says it fit my truck, however, I did have to make modifications to the dash, it is thicker than most 2 din radios.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: BLUE TOOTH AND NAVIGATION ISSUES
customer_reviews.text: We paid to have this installed is the only reason it is not being returned. I will be out the $200 installation fee. So yes it was installed by a professional. Also we needed a radio because the other one was shorting out causing battery to die. So really do not need these functions but would have been nice to be able to use something that was supposed to work. At first it worked. Within a week the blue tooth stopped connecting. It turned off and will not turn back on. Then the navigation part will work but always says i am in Washington and will give directions from Washington DC no matter what you do. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: serena

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, however had issues with product.
customer_reviews.text: purchased in September 2016. worked pretty well as first, after 3 months or so the touch screen is not responsive. It's now September 2017 and touch screen does not work at all. very frustrating - product should last more than a year. I guess you get what you pay for. Update- I called Boss and they said they would send me a new one since it's still under warranty. Great customer service. I'll let you know how the new one works out.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months before I gave my review.!. So I had this for 7 months and I must say it’s pretty good.!. Plays my DVDs well and streaming my music works without a Hitch.!. My only mistake was I thought it was Detachable Face but it’s not and again it’s MY FAULT FOR NOT READING.!. For $68 it was a great deal with the Coupon I had
customer_reviews.author: KVS

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2019
customer_reviews.text: Bought feb 20, 2019 and needed a cheap doubble din with good sound. Delivered in every aspect the Bluetooth is very clear radio disc and aux all sound great I understand the radios picture is a little outdated but it turns on and connects decently fast for me and is responsive. very happy with the purchase for the money. I put it in a 2011 mustang with a scosche dash kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Smeltzer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd unit in 3 months to fail
customer_reviews.text: Purchased original unit for bluetooth and navigation. Navigation is glitchy and bluetooth goes out after about a week. Then about 3 days later it turned off and wouldn't turn back on..checked fuses and then wires..good..checked the back of the stereo and it showed open circuit. Took about a week to sort out the replacement. Second unit lasted about three months and low and behold..the same issue. I've been a fan of Boss for years..but this unit isn't worth buying. Only gave it a single star so that I could right a review.
customer_reviews.author: Evan H.

customer_reviews.title: Look for something that plays MP4 videos. This doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: This was ok but wished I looked at the specs a little closer. This doesn’t play MP4’s at all! At this price you should look elsewhere and spend a little more for this feature. I like to download videos onto a flash drive a play them while driving and can’t do that with its unit. Will be replacing this very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Glynn Nichalson

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Pass..
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived DOA. Replacement installed as expected but with limited functionality before finally dying three months later. Just spend the money on a better unit otherwise you'll be cussing like a sailor. For those who need things to 'just work,' this is not the item for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Display problems
customer_reviews.text: Display developed a milky display after two weeks. Difficult to contact manufacturer for warranty support. Guess I’m stuck with a milky display. Update. Amazon sent me a replacement but it has a very similar problem (see photos). This seems to be a manufacturing defect with this batch of radios. If you can live with it all other functions are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drymon

customer_reviews.title: So far So good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for my son's, 2000 F250. Installation was relatively easy. As the specifications noted, slight modification to the truck dash was necessary for the unit to fit into the dash hole. I purchased the dash mount kit, and only used a portion of it. I had to customize the mounting for it to work and hold the unit in place. Initial sound checks of the unit were good. So far so good. We'll see how it handles a few hunting trips. If the unit holds up, I'll probably get another one for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome buy. Great deal and works perfectly. I only wish a wiring harness was available that was compatible with my vehicle. Wiring took some time, but a soldering iron and some shrink wrap and your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Uh60delta

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this radio not too long ago. It work perfectly fine for about 4 months and then the problems started. The Bluetooth doesn't connect anymore. Like at all! I've tried to rest the unit and the Bluetooth still won't connect. While listening to the radio, the unit will flip between the different settings (radio, CD, Aux and back to the radio) whenever it wants to, for however long it wants to. Ive been putting up with it but this unit will definitely be coming out of this car ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: BreAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for the price
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this stereo. Some reviewers stated that in radio mode the volumn would be erratic. I have not seen that issue. The volumn works great in any mode for me. I have truly enjoyed this unit. The only issue I have seen is when the sun shines on the display it is hard to see. This can be problematic when using the navigation system, but this is a very small issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Naquin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality radio
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio! Nice graphics and very easy to use, many features and love the crisp clear external microphone, hands free calling is a breeze. The remote is super handy too. Nothing negative about this item, love it
customer_reviews.author: Ana Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works great. the navigation is accurate even though the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. the navigation is accurate even though the way is formatted is different than other gps systems, the sound is great, the bluetooth calling is clear on the other side double din sizing was great for my suv. I recommend buying the antenna, installation kit, stereo connector, and wire harness adapter for your vehicle model, to make the install the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad radio
customer_reviews.text: Is a ok radio had some issues with connectivity was having issues with the power supply but didn't know if it was my truck or the radio, good sound but doesn't have features like a smart radio I send it back due to some electrical issues dont know if it was the radio or my truck
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: sounding almost like a scratchy CD
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the Bluetooth will just stop working. I have an iPhone 7. Once it stops I have to restart my car to get it to work again. Also skips using Bluetooth sometimes, sounding almost like a scratchy CD. —- 1 month after review — now noticing the clock is 5 mins ahead of what I set it to... buy something better if you can
customer_reviews.author: Bryan McMinn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Boss stereo for my project car that I don’t drive much. I have the Boss Audio BV9386NV Double Din in another vehicle and I’m really happy with it. This one is terrible compared to that one. The screen is extremely difficult to press buttons on, the volume control has way too much difference between each level of volume, and it has a very limited adjustment menu. I would have given it two stars if the screen actually worked right when you try to push a touchscreen button, but it’s takes five or six try’s every time to change a station or menu item.
customer_reviews.author: Wilsontsi

customer_reviews.title: STOP. Waste time and money
customer_reviews.text: Got this amazing double din thought it would just fit right in with ease... I checked if it fit my truck. And after 2 hours of struggling to Cut, Move,and wiggle those thing in the stereo slot ... Looked all Over Amazon to find a double din installation kit for my Mazda truck... No luck.... So after 2 hours of my time wasted .. And searching for adapter kit. I highly suggest you call or check with the provider to see if it fits. I checked and I guessed all the money was well wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin rapoza

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. I don't even have to touch my phone once it is hooked up to the radio. If I want to play my Pandora all I have to do is go to Bluetooth and push play. I did not use the backup camera that came with the radio because I did not want to drill a hole in my bumper or my trunk so I bought a license plate camera and it works so great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: dont by
customer_reviews.text: i have bought products from this company before. boss/ssl and was fine but recently I had to send back 3 radios from boss due to not working from start or after a couple weeks I just bought this one and sent back the same day due to it not reading the usb drive and software its self was glitchy I am very disappointed latly with products from stereo to amps even the speakers are ehhhh lately or I just seemed to be given the bad batch. for the price I would just spend anouther $40-$50 for a pioneer head unit you will save your self a headache
customer_reviews.author: Kara Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this system
customer_reviews.text: I had this system installed for two months while the sound is quality good the radio stations for no reason just get wipe out, I had reprogram the station 5x already, also the clock changes times by it self it could be set one day the next time you start your car the time is 8 hrs. different. playing a CD there is a animated grafted equalizer that just flashes and not to any beat of an music. since it has been over 30 days I can't used Amazon return. Don't Buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I give this four stars. Because it got here ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this four stars. Because it got here in two days & everything is working on it. But I had a little problem installing it. It's not really hard but you have to deal with a lot of wires & I had to get a mounting kit because my Charger 2008 didn't really fix this radio. Out of all, I will tell anybody to buy this stereo. You getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall P.

customer_reviews.title: All is well.
customer_reviews.text: People, just so you know. I installed this myself, it was easy. It works. It works well, in fact. Sounds good, sounds really good if you ask me. And it does everything I need it to do. Nothing wrong at all. People give this a bad review, but I have no complaints. I think people are just too frickin picky. Everything about this works well, and sounds good, with no problems. AND you don't have to spend a ton of money. AND no one will smash your windows trying to steal a really expensive stereo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this stereo for a while now and there are more things that I dislike about it than like. -As you turn the stereo up between certain numbers 6-7, 12-13, and so on the volume doesn’t gradually go up, there is a huge volume jump. -Sometimes when I start my car it will just have a blue screen, you can’t do anything. I end up having to turn my car off completely for it to work a again. -It does have Bluetooth, but it will randomly reset itself. I have to go into my phone settings, forget the current Boss device and reput in the “new” one. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: 01 Civic Install
customer_reviews.text: The installation of this head unit in my 01 Civic was very easy never installed a stereo before this one I was going to take it to a professional installer but they wanted too much money so I decided to do it myself. I was very nervous going into the install but I was able to watch some videos on YouTube and did the install myself, I’m very pleased with the results very good product for the price time will tell how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: EDDIE B. CHEA

customer_reviews.title: Really nice deck for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! had to cut quite a bit of the dash out to make it fit. (behind the cluster area) but other than that.. took a while to get the steering wheel interface control to work. (there is a menu on the touch screen to program it, duh!) the audio mutes when the rear backup camera engages which is slightly annoying, but is okay. rather than hook to my reverse lights, i hooked it to a toggle switch so i can choose when to engage it (even while driving to double check my trailer)
customer_reviews.author: Lazerus

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've install it 3 days now and I love it, sound quality is amazing, the only problem so far is it's not fully picking up my local radio stations but everything else is perfect. This is an update, I've figured how to pick up local stations on it and needles to say everything is working excellent I even attached a rear view camera . I love it excellent radio, if your looking to buy this are any other radio make sure who ever is installing it knows what they are doing, non of the negatives comments I've experienced with this.
customer_reviews.author: Remlap

customer_reviews.title: Bang For You Buck!!
customer_reviews.text: So far this system functionality is pretty decent. Installed it just yesterday and I must say, it work great compared to other systems I previously installed for myself and my clients. if your looking for a good double din system at a low cost, THIS IS A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Akeem

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio! I don't always write reviews but wanted to let folks know I was very pleased with this radio. I wanted one for my 2008 grand marquis that would link through Bluetooth to my iPhone. It has performed admirably. Installed easily. I had to trim the opening on the dash, but that is due to the way the grand marquis is designed. Sounds great with the cars stock speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Swigart

customer_reviews.title: 2011 crv
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio I love the way it looks it sound awesome paired with boss audio 4 way speakers the picture on the radio looks great when playing dvds obviously when parked and the e brake on 😉 I would defiantly buy another for my next car thanx
customer_reviews.author: ThealmightyD

customer_reviews.title: Everything is possible
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Only had 1 issue when super cold the display was funk. When the car was turned off and on again it was fine. Only happened once. Also the time adjusts depending on the station you are on. I think I still have auto time on, but yeah watch out for that. Other than that PERFECT! Camera is working and I was able to install switch to enable the camera while driving as well as DVD. But I do not use it because I do not have DVDs anymore. However if that is your thing, then it is possible.
customer_reviews.author: PicoBubDen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: In use about a week now and works very well. The GPS antenna comes with unit, I purchased one separate not knowing this. Amazon was quick to accept return of GPS unit. System was very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: wolfric

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Faulty product, does not function properly. Radio station keeps changing while vehicle is driving even with auto frequency turned off. Station changes when car door opens and closes. Keeps skipping and fast forwarding songs when in CD player mode while driving. Does the same thing in SD card and USB mode. Total waste of my money. Returning product would cost more than cost and would still have to pay to ship replacement. Bought item online in Jamaica.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.. get a warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is decent for the price however the first one I received lasted a week before suddenly dying. A replacement was sent very promptly. The new was has been going strong for 6 months now but I did by the amazon warranty just in case. Pros Decent audio quality Plays most dad's Plays most audio formats Easy to bypass brake Bluetooth calls are clear Cons Some dvds don't work. Touchscreen is moody but not unusable Bluetooth streaming cuts out randomly Get a warranty
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. it's very user friendly, you can get to all its functions easily and everything is straight forward. looks very nice. And the best past is the price. This is the best unit I have ever purchased considering the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Junk - stay away
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this head unit back in April 2019 for my Xterra. Installation went okay despite the lack of instructions. This morning when I started the engine the stereo wouldn't come on; just a black screen - no sound, nothing, nada. This head unit had hardly seen any usage since installation (1 month and 28 days to be exact) and I have another automobile that I used more regularly to commute to work - go figure. Don't take a chance on this product. It's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tunde Owoola

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how good this unit is! Seriously impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressed with this unit.. Built well. Dvd works awesome. Brought new life to my new speakers. Power output is good too.. You cant beat this kind of quality for the price. Comes with stylis too. Wont use it though. Sounds like some units priced 60-100 dollars more. Was skeptical but ended up amazed. No this is not for someone who does competition... But a serious upgrade with lots of features. Also make sure you do that parking brake hack too. No complaints what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: No Installation Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The backup camera works well, the DVD has a good picture (something I won't use often,) the GPS seems to be decent but I still haven't tested it fully and the audio is good. I usually play audio from several albums on a USB drive. I have yet to figure out how to selected a different album.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Nice, for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, for the price. I do wish it came with instructions. That made it tough. it froze up a couple times when as soon as I started the truck I threw it in reverse, guess it got confused with the backup camera comming on so quickly. Didn't work again until the vehicle had been shut off. nice tho. "up dated review" beginning to hate it, freezes half the time I start and drive my truck, GRRR.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The music sounds fine off Bluetooth. The USB plug will charge my iPhone but won't do anything else, I have to use Bluetooth. The unit is slow when changing inputs as it appears to "reload" each time like an overworked processor. DVD's worked initially but yesterday the movie wouldn't play. The screen is pretty dark, you really can't see the movie anyways, regardless of the brightness settings. The unit does not connect to interior illumination, so the brightness doesn't change with the truck's lights. But, I needed Bluetooth and backup camera input and it does these items, so I will keep it for now, but I won't get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price. Had for years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Had this for several years in my 2011 ram. Works great, no issues whatsoever and is used daily. The touch screen is temperamental and doesn't always respond right away but after a few taps it will go. The clock runs fast on it. But nonetheless it is a great radio for the money! I'll buy another one when I need to!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Workman

customer_reviews.title: camera cord too short to install
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should however the cord for the back up camera (av) was about 5 feet to short to install on my truck. Had to complete replacement cord to get the camera to work. Had to wait for cord to come in. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: CaBang Detail

customer_reviews.title: Id give it a 4 and a half stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a 4 and a half cause I'm very satisfied with the way the gps, the display for back up camera, and Bluetooth works but when the little things is why it would lose half a star. Doesn't display that songs I'm listening to on Bluetooth and now after having it for almost a year when I try turning up it will turn down then up and it's hard to get it on the proper number but can't complain with price overall a great unit
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio! I replaced a Bose radio in my 09 silverado and this hd radio made it sound even better. I love all the features. Easy install with harness adapter.
customer_reviews.author: D.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in a 2000 F150. No problems with the radio, I had trouble with the trucks wiring color codes. I would have liked a harness connector. I had to do some cutting to fit the unit, everything was plastic so it cut easy with my air saws.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Merando

customer_reviews.title: Flat didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas to put in his 2005 truck. Initially opening the box, the remote was missing and there was no film on the display. We thought was odd and had been opened. After trying to install, the thing wouldn't even turn on AT ALL. This was clearly a broken item that had been sent back by someone else already and no one even flagged it as such, so it was just shipped out again to some other sucker....ME.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnster

customer_reviews.title: The sound was great, the touch screen not so
customer_reviews.text: The sound was great, the touch screen not so,it sometimes refuses to register my commands even after 3 or 4 attempts to change the station! I ordered the metra steering wheel audio control adapter but two different installers were unable to program it even though the seller recommended the adapter. Both installers recommended an upgraded unit so that the steering wheel controls work.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Love

customer_reviews.title: KEEP YOUR FACTORY RADIO
customer_reviews.text: seen other reviews talking about hissing noise at low volume but thought people were just being picky, not the case the annoying white noise won't go away and is loud while playing cds, bluetooth, phone, it was not installed incorrectly just the way the radio is which is beyond me, read other people called tech support and wasted their time installing a filter that did nothing so I returned for a pioneer and no problems, also volume at lowest setting is way to loud, don't buy unless you can't afford a better radio
customer_reviews.author: Tom Welch

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable this is a great value for the buck
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable this is a great value for the buck. that being said you can read all the features it has. my only complaint is the volume knob is small and slippery. easy fix for me, I just put a rubber sink washer on it. lol.. I am an audio-tech geek and have been around a few. this is a home run if it has the features you want, it is loaded and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: raiderx

customer_reviews.title: It's so so
customer_reviews.text: At first liked the radio and price was good. Had it in about a week now,first hot day even with the window down to let the heat out radio started acting up set to channel 6 and it puts it self on one now matter how many times you set to preset or other channel it sets to preset 1... Dvd to speakers is about a second off which I can deal with it the fact it's playing the. It decides to back up to to last play point and starts again .. streaming side works great
customer_reviews.author: michael r king

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Still tryna program and figure out the navigation but I’m smarter than the piece of equipment I’m working with so I’ll get it! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: 2004 Dodge Ram
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly nervous buying this as I was reading mixed reviews. My only disappointment so far is I planned spending a whole night installing and it only took an hour. I had to put a new bezel in which was a breeze and the stereo itself seems to fit well. Haven't taken the time to install the back up cam yet, because it's winter and didn't want to deal with running the wires under my truck. So far, I am very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the radio but there are some aggervating flaws. I can't seem to set my equalizer up right. I do it then turn my truck off and it doesn't save it and also I can't get it to sit flush where my factory radio did. Kinda sticks out and looks stupid. But other than that I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap touch screen multimedia player and decided to try this. It works. Sounds ok and offers many options to play music. But, the menus are clunky, I still haven't figure out how to make a call from my phone but it does receive calls ok. The screen is very bright at night but if you click on the time it will display only the time on a gray screen. For a cheap unit it work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked well for a cheap radio. I bought it because I wanted to add the hands free option to my 2000 4Runner and also install a rear view camera. It has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jay Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: A radio with just about everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Really good radio for the price, only regret I wish I would have gotten radio with navigation. Update: It's been a few months now and I'm still loving this system. I read some of the other reviews and can't for the life of me understand why others are having problems. Note* to make things much easier, please get a wiring harness for make and model of your car. No matter what radio you install, wires are already labeled for you.
customer_reviews.author: BLUFFER

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems BV9386NV Car GPS Navigation - Double Din, Bluetooth Audio and Hands-Free Calling, 6.2 Inch Touchscreen LCD, MP3, CD, DVD Player, USB, SD, AUX-A/V Inputs, AM/FM Radio Receiver
product_meta.description: Style:Bluetooth with Navigation & Hi-Res AudioThe In-Dash Boss Audio BV9386NV combines easy navigation and entertainment with a 6.2" touchscreen monitor. With pre-loaded maps for all 50 US states and Puerto Rico, you’ll never miss a turn on your next road trip. Get your fingers tapping on the steering wheel to songs on the radio or take advantage of the built-in CD/DVD player, SD, USB and Auxiliary ports to play your favorite music. Bluetooth technology enables you to stream music wirelessly through apps like Spotify and Pandora as well as make and receive calls hands free. With the Boss Audio BV9386NV you’ll get to your destination and enjoy the journey. For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: GPS Navigation - Built-in GPS (Global Positioning System) includes coverage of all 50 states, Puerto Rico and pre-loaded point of interest. The text-to-speech allows for an audible prompt, guiding to your final destination

Bluetooth - Answer/make calls and be hands-free with no distractions. The built-in microphone picks up your voice and your car speakers let you hear the person on the other side. Play and control your music and apps like Spotify/Pandora wirelessly
Media Playback - Watch videos through the DVD player. Connect your Bluetooth device, pop in a CD, use the USB / SD ports, or tune into the AM/FM radio stations for more audio alternatives. RBDS tuner
Auxiliary - Compatible with the audio output from smartphones as well as MP3 players. Just plug in and start playing

Inputs - USB, SD, Aux, A/V, USB charging, rearview camera (camera sold separately). The steering wheel interface allows you to use the existing functions on your steering wheel. Interface module sold separately. We recommend the Metra ASWC-1

Outputs - Use the video, front, rear & subwoofer pre-amp outputs to hook up your speakers (front left / front right and rear left / rear right) and subwoofer. The video output allows you to connect an extra screen for more viewing capability
Power - You can get 80 watts x 4 Max power from the BV9386NV to power your speakers. An amplifier is recommended to make sure your speakers are well powered
Equalizer - Customize how you want to hear your music with the balance / fader / bass and treble and control it all with the wireless remote control from either inside or outside of your vehicle

Warranty - BOSS Audio Systems provides a powerful 3-year platinum online dealer warranty so long as the purchase is made through Amazon.com. We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars3,727 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Mounting hardware, Stylus pen, I/O harness, GPS antenna, User's manual, Power harness, Remote control
